citations.narrative:
The facility's Annual Report for fiscal year 2022 reported more animals in pain category "D" than were used for research
activity by the facility during the reporting period. In order to ensure accurate reporting, the annual report must state both
the common names and the correct numbers of animals on which research activity was conducted.
Facility representatives initiated a request to correct the FY2022 Annual Report at the time of inspection. To remain
corrected from May 18th, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC chair and additional facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.36(b)(6) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility's Annual Report for fiscal year 2022 reported more animals in pain category "D" than were used for research 
activity by the facility during the reporting period. In order to ensure accurate reporting, the annual report must state both 
the common names and the correct numbers of animals on which research activity was conducted. 
 
Facility representatives initiated a request to correct the FY2022 Annual Report at the time of inspection. To remain 
corrected from May 18th, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC chair and additional facility representatives.
